snippet.title: Turn it up to the Max by @Bogotolec - Twitch Plays Conway's Game of Life - Sir Robin Edition
snippet.description:
Play Conway's Game of Life by typing commands in the Twitch chat: https://www.twitch.tv/bzh314
Don't just turn it up to 11, go all the way to the Max (http://www.conwaylife.com/wiki/Max).
@Bogotolec (https://www.twitch.tv/bogotolec) used the multi-line !RLE command (https://bzh314.com/twitch_plays_conway_game_of_life/#rle) introduced in the Sir Robin Edition of TPCGOL to create a Max (http://www.conwaylife.com/wiki/Max), a spacefiller (http://www.conwaylife.com/wiki/Spacefiller) discovered in 1995 by Tim Coe expanding into Zebra stripes (http://www.conwaylife.com/wiki/Zebra_stripes).

The Multi-line Run Length Encoded commands (https://bzh314.com/twitch_plays_conway_game_of_life/#rle) used for the Max:
!rle 18bo8b$17b3o7b$12b3o4b2o6b$11bo2b3o2bob2o4b$10bo3bobo2bobo5b$10bo4bobobobob2o2b$12bo4bobo3b2o2b$4o5bobo4bo3bob3o2b$o3b2obob3ob2o9b2ob$o5b2o5bo13b$bo2b2obo2bo2bob2o10b$7bobobobobobo5b4o$bo2b2obo2bo2bo2b2obob2o3bo$o5b2o3bobobo3b2o5bo$o3b2obob2o2bo2bo2b
!rle ob2o2bob$4o5bobobobobobo7b$10b2obo2bo2bob2o2bob$13bo5b2o5bo$b2o9b2ob3obob2o3bo$2b3obo3bo4bobo5b4o$2b2o3bobo4bo12b$2b2obobobobo4bo10b$5bobo2bobo3bo10b$4b2obo2b3o2bo11b$6b2o4b3o12b$7b3o17b$8bo! 0,0

More:
* VOD with chat commands: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/346987847
* Homepage of Twitch Plays Conway's Game of Life: https://bzh314.com/twitch_plays_conway_game_of_life/
* TPCGOL is built with the Unity3d Entity Component System (ECS)
* Play Now on #Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/bzh314

#Twitch #Unity3D #SpinalTap #TwitchPlays #GameDev #IndieGame
